meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2343.

td.p: Lou Diamond Phillips, an actor from La Bamba and Stand and Deliver
Marilu Henner, an author and host of her own talk show from Marilu
Jason Alexander, a Tony Award winner from Jerome Robbins' Broadway and Seinfeld

tr.td: THE 1950s
